column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Common bond
column2: FTW ! I love it ! Everything from their coffee
column3: baked goods and food are all to die for !  I love the clean look of the place and when you walk in all their baked goods are on display. I also really like how they have their own parking lot which consists of more than 5 spaces
column4: love that!  The only recommendation I would have is to show up earlier than later. Since everything is baked that day sometimes they run out of stuff
column5: but no need to fret just try one of their other amazingly good treats !
